subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=85|rad=水|as=12|sn=15|canj=ETYJ|four=|ids=⿰氵萃}}

# (same as [[漼]]) having the appearance of depth
# to shed tears, to cry or weep
# sharp
# bright-colored
# a river in ancient times, Guishui
# (interchangeable [[摧]]) to destroy, to injure, to damage
# to store up, to accumulate
